name: Online Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
An online Tic-Tac-Toe game made using my OpenGL Game Engine and online functionality using Photon.

This game was made for my Data Communication & Networking class in UOW Malaysia KDU's Game Development course.

The source code for this game can be found here:
https://github.com/chanzhe99/Tic-Tac-Toe
